name: Dark Survival
storyline:
As you explore the island find items to help you survive including food, first aid and weapons to keep you safe.

When you die you start back at the shore.

Find clues including notes and tapes from the last person to “survive” here.

Full weather system.

Join with friends to survive or fight foes to claim food and items.

Horde Mode - Pick up as much as you can and survive the horde of monsters.
summary: Dark Survival is a horror survival game with a mix of the classic survival mechanics of find the items around the map to survive and the scary sounds and monsters of a horror game.
